remarks.para: One may be inoperative closed provided:

numlitem.para: Approach minimums do not require its use.

note.para: If No. 1, 2, or 3 BTB is inoperative, triple channel autoland will not be available.
The following EICAS message(s) may be displayed:

numlitem.para: Downgrade Aircraft Category Dispatch Status to CAT 2.

placard.para: Placard Bus Tie Breaker (BTB) "INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

maintenance.title: BUS TIE BREAKERS (BTB)
maintenance.para: Deferral of this item requires downgrading to the status indicated in the A/C STATUS DISPATCH column below.
Use the following procedure to verify the bus tie breaker (BTB) failure condition:

numlitem.para: Apply APU or external power, if not already accomplished.
Verify all BUS TIE switches, located on P5 overhead panel, are set to AUTO and the ISLN lights are extinguished.

note.para: If any ISLN lights are illuminated with all BUS TIE switches set to the AUTO position and both sync buses powered, this is an indication of an open bus tie breaker.
